body_html:
@MahdiNazemi I solved this problem by comparing with other machines. In /use/lib64

libcuda.so -> /usr/lib64/libcuda.so.1
libcuda.so.1 -> /usr/lib64/nvidia/libcuda.so.1

libcuda.so.1 should be linked to /usr/lib64/nvidia/libcuda.so.1

Good luck!
